H0.text: What was the profession of the 7 Dwarfs, according to the Disney movie. Blacksmith

H1.text: What was the profession of the 7 Dwarfs, according to the Disney movie. Carpenter

H2.text: What was the profession of the 7 Dwarfs, according to the Disney movie. Engineer

H3.text: What was the profession of the 7 Dwarfs, according to the Disney movie. Miner

A4.text: The Seven Dwarfs live in a tiny cottage and work in the nearby mines.
